description:
Located in Elgin, Illinois, Bingham Law focuses solely on personal injury and workers' compensation law. Serving clients throughout Kane and McHenry counties, our law firm is dedicated to helping innocent accident victims and injured workers secure the compensation and benefits they need to support themselves and their families.

Having practiced law since 1992, attorney Richard Bingham heads our practice, and he has an extensive amount of knowledge and resources he uses to recover the maximum amount possible for those in need. Whether you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of another party's negligence, or you were hurt on the job, Mr. Bingham and our law firm will fight hard to hold the responsible parties accountable and protect your rights.

Understanding that each client's case is unique, Mr. Bingham will work to fully understand your situation, address your concerns and devise a solution tailored to your specific circumstances. Through his efforts, he has secured substantial settlements and awards on behalf of his clients, including several in excess of a million dollars.

For more information about how Bingham Law can provide the assistance and support you need during your difficult time, call our law office for a free initial consultation.
